summary: This cluster provides an interface to allow configuration of the user interface for a thermostat, or a thermostat controller device, that supports a keypad and LCD screen.

0x0001.name: KeypadLockout
0x0001.description: Level of functionality available to the user via keypad

0x0002.name: ScheduleProgrammingVisibility
0x0002.description: Level of programming functionality available to the user

values.0: NoLockout - All functionality available to the user
values.5: Lockout5 - Least functionality available to the user

values.0: ScheduleProgrammingPermitted - Local schedule programming functionality is enabled at the thermostat
values.1: ScheduleProgrammingDenied - Local schedule programming functionality is disabled at the thermostat

revision_history.description: New data model format and notation
